VST 3 Examples  VST 3.7
SDK for developing VST plug-in
 

- l -

  • l2l : ImageProcessor
  • l2r : ImageProcessor
  • lastnote : JX10Processor
  • ldel : DelayProcessor
  • ldisp : SplitterProcessor
  • left : TestToneProcessor
  • len : TestToneProcessor
  • lev : JX10Processor::VOICE
  • lev2 : JX10Processor::VOICE
  • level : ShepardProcessor , SplitterProcessor
  • levelFromVel : Voice< SamplePrecision >
  • lfo : JX10Processor
  • lfo0 : DX10Processor , EPianoProcessor
  • lfo1 : DX10Processor , EPianoProcessor
  • lfoHz : JX10Processor
  • lfomode : RezFilterProcessor
  • Lhold : SpecMeterProcessor
  • lin : DegradeProcessor
  • lin2 : DegradeProcessor
  • ll : SplitterProcessor
  • llev : LeslieProcessor
  • Lmin : SpecMeterProcessor
  • lmin : SpecMeterProcessor
  • lmix : DelayProcessor , DubDelayProcessor
  • lmod : EPianoProcessor
  • lmom : LeslieProcessor
  • loop : EPianoProcessor::KGRP , EPianoProcessor::VOICE , PianoProcessor::KGRP , PianoProcessor::VOICE
  • Lpeak : SpecMeterProcessor
  • lpeak : SpecMeterProcessor
  • lpf : ComboProcessor
  • lphi : LeslieProcessor
  • lpp : SpecMeterProcessor
  • lrms : SpecMeterProcessor
  • Lrms : SpecMeterProcessor
  • lset : LeslieProcessor
  • lspd : LeslieProcessor
  • lthr : DynamicsProcessor
  • lwid : LeslieProcessor
